description: Bella has come a long way - and today she shows her mat skills and her absolute love of dominating with her body. She pins Sahara over and over and gets every inch of her voluptuous body all pressed up against Sahara to score sex points in rapid fire succession. Sahara does not, however, just roll over and take it, she fights her heart out trying to escape Bella and has a few shining moments of her own. Not enough shine though and Bella shows her how to be a good, sore loser with a massive strap-on.
title: The Annihilator uses her moves and her curves to Dominate
